EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_She's Pivotal_MO_Q216.Post-event
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you - She’s Pivotal Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your participation in the She’s Pivotal: Transforming Who’s Building the World’s Software networking event held on Thursday, June 9th.
We encourage you to share your experience from the day with your friends to Transform Who’s Building the World’s Software.
We value your feedback. Please complete the brief survey <[[http://pivotal.events.sgizmo.com/s3]]>.
Please visit our event page at http://pivotal.io/event/shes-pivotal <[[http://pivotal.io/event/shes-pivotal]]> for valuable next steps.
